```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r read excel, echo = FALSE}
library(readxl)
Summer_24 <- read_excel("~/Downloads/Summer'24.xlsx")
```


```{r library, echo = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(tidymodels)
library(scatterplot3d)
```

```{r summary}
summary_stats_D <- Summer_24 %>% 
  group_by(D) %>% 
  summarize(mean_moisture = mean(soil_moisture), 
            median_moisture = median(soil_moisture),
            sd_moisture = sd(soil_moisture),
            min_soil_moisture = min(soil_moisture, na.rm = TRUE),
    max_soil_moisture = max(soil_moisture, na.rm = TRUE))


summary_stats_microclimate <- Summer_24 %>% 
  group_by(microclimate_id) %>% 
  summarize(mean_moisture = mean(soil_moisture), 
            median_moisture = median(soil_moisture),
            sd_moisture = sd(soil_moisture),
            min_soil_moisture = min(soil_moisture, na.rm = TRUE),
    max_soil_moisture = max(soil_moisture, na.rm = TRUE))


summary_stats_p <- Summer_24 %>% 
  group_by(P) %>% ##p represents the treatment of each subplot
  summarize(mean_moisture = mean(soil_moisture), 
            median_moisture = median(soil_moisture),
            sd_moisture = sd(soil_moisture),
            min_soil_moisture = min(soil_moisture, na.rm = TRUE),
    max_soil_moisture = max(soil_moisture, na.rm = TRUE))


```

```{r boxplots}
ggplot(Summer_24, aes(x = factor(D), y = soil_moisture)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(x = "D Value", y = "Soil Moisture") +
  theme_minimal()

ggplot(Summer_24, aes(x = factor(microclimate_id), y = soil_moisture)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(x = "Microclimate", y = "Soil Moisture") +
  theme_minimal()

ggplot(Summer_24, aes(x = factor(P), y = soil_moisture)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(x = "Treatment Type", y = "Soil Moisture") +
  theme_minimal()
```
